app.title: Ayurvedic Diet Planner
app.subtitle: Personalized diet plans based on your unique constitution (Prakriti)
app.footer: This is a Proof of Concept application for Ayurvedic diet planning.
welcome.title: AyurBytes
welcome.subtitle: Your personalized Ayurvedic diet planner that creates balanced meal plans based on your unique constitution (Prakriti)
welcome.step1.title: Tell Us About You
welcome.step1.desc: Share your age, body type, and health goals using our simple or detailed form
welcome.step2.title: Get Your Diet Plan
welcome.step2.desc: Receive a personalized meal plan balanced for your Prakriti (Vata, Pitta, or Kapha)
welcome.step3.title: Track & Improve
welcome.step3.desc: Monitor your progress, explore recipes, and adjust your diet for optimal health
welcome.feature1.title: Quick Start
welcome.feature1.desc: New to Ayurveda? Use our 30-second Quick Form to get started instantly with basic recommendations.
welcome.feature2.title: Deep Assessment
welcome.feature2.desc: Want personalized care? Our Comprehensive Assessment considers your health conditions, lifestyle, and goals.
welcome.feature3.title: Track Progress
welcome.feature3.desc: Monitor your diet journey with beautiful charts showing calorie trends, nutrients, and compliance metrics.
welcome.feature4.title: Recipe Library
welcome.feature4.desc: Discover Ayurvedic recipes tailored to your diet plan with step-by-step cooking instructions.
welcome.cta.title: Ready to Begin?
welcome.cta.subtitle: Choose your path below - Quick Form for beginners, or Comprehensive Assessment for detailed guidance
welcome.latestPlan.title: Your Latest Diet Plan
welcome.latestPlan.subtitle: Here's your personalized Ayurvedic meal plan. Explore recipes or track your progress in the Dashboard.
form.title: Patient Information
quickform.title: Quick Start Form
quickform.subtitle: Get started in just 30 seconds with basic information
quickform.info: Perfect for beginners! This form collects essential information to generate your first Ayurvedic diet plan. You can always use the Comprehensive Assessment later for more personalized recommendations.
assessment.title: Comprehensive Health Assessment
assessment.subtitle: Detailed evaluation for personalized care
assessment.info: For best results! This detailed form considers your medical history, lifestyle, and health goals to create a highly personalized Ayurvedic diet plan tailored to your unique needs.
prakriti.vata.detailed: Governs movement, breathing, and nervous system
prakriti.kapha.detailed: Governs structure, immunity, and emotional stability
diet.title: Your Personalized Diet Plan
diet.empty.message: Complete the form to generate Ayurvedic diet plan tailored to the unique constitution.
dashboard.title: Your Health Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Track your progress and nutrition trends
dashboard.emptyState: No data yet. Generate a diet plan to start tracking!
recipes.title: Ayurvedic Recipe Library
recipes.subtitle: Discover traditional recipes aligned with your dietary needs
recipes.search.placeholder: Search recipes by name, ingredients, or description...
recipes.noResults.title: No recipes found
recipes.noResults.subtitle: Try adjusting your search or filters
